SCTX - Script Source:
ScriptName fbmwtulscript

Begin onDeath
	IF GetStage fbmwMVFakeSlave <= 50
		SetStage fbmwMVFakeSlave 90
	ENDIF

	IF GetStage fbmwMVFakeSlave >= 60 && GetStage fbmwMVFakeSlave < 80
		SetStage fbmwMVFakeSlave 80
		fbmwsterdecanref.StopCombat
	ENDIF

	SET fbmwMVFakeSlave.FollowNow TO 0
END

Begin OnPackageEnd fbmwtulfollow
	SetStage fbmwMVFakeSlave 60
	SET fbmwMVFakeSlave.FollowNow TO 0
	mwTulREF.EvaluatePackage
END

Begin GameMode
	if GetQuestRunning fbmwMVFakeSlave == 0
		return
	endif

	IF GetDistance fbmwsterdecanref <= 512 && GetStage fbmwMVFakeSlave < 60
		SetStage fbmwMVFakeSlave 60
		mwTulREF.StartConversation Player GREETING
	endif
END
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 0 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
